page.title: 02 COMMERCIAL
page.content: There are not many shops on the island of Sark, compared with Guernsey or Jersey, and what there are, are mainly food or general stores. There is 1 bakery, which is combined with a grocery and paper shop. The grocery and health shop, "The Rendezvous", also sells bread from Guernsey and Mr Leworthy, (who bakes at his home).Mr John Jackson, owns the island bakery, "Jackson's stores", (a general shop), and"Isabels", which is 1 of the 2 clohes shops, also selling toys , wools, shoes and gifts."Bon Appetit", is a butchers, (the only one apart from the bakery.) We have one post office, which sells gardening equipment and general goods."The Little shop", sells general goods too.the "Mon Plaisir" is a grocery shop, which is situated away from the main street.
